Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: pre-commit

Arguments.Name: -V
Arguments.Description: Show program's version number and exit

Arguments.Name: autoupdate
Arguments.Description: Auto-update pre-commit config to the latest repos' versions

Arguments.Name: --color
Arguments.Description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`

Arguments.Name: --bleeding-edge
Arguments.Description: Update to the bleeding edge of `master` instead of the latest tagged version (the default behavior)

Arguments.Name: --freeze
Arguments.Description: Store 'frozen' hashes in `rev` instead of tag names

Arguments.Name: --repo
Arguments.Description: Only update this repository -- may be specified multiple times

Arguments.Name: --color
Arguments.Description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`

Arguments.Name: --color
Arguments.Description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`

Arguments.Name: init-templatedir
Arguments.Description: Install hook script in a directory intended for use with `git config init.templateDir`

Arguments.Name: --color
Arguments.Description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`

Arguments.Name: --no-allow-missing-config
Arguments.Description: Assume cloned repos should have a `pre-commit` config

Arguments.Name: --color
Arguments.Description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`

Arguments.Name: -f
Arguments.Description: Overwrite existing hooks / remove migration mode

Arguments.Name: install-hooks
Arguments.Description: Whether to install hook environments for all environments in the config file

Arguments.Name: --allow-missing-config
Arguments.Description: Whether to allow a missing `pre-commit` configuration file or exit with a failure code

Arguments.Name: migrate-config
Arguments.Description: Migrate list configuration to new map configuration

Arguments.Name: --color
Arguments.Description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`

Arguments.Name: --color
Arguments.Description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`

Arguments.Name: --all-files
Arguments.Description: Run all files in the repo

Arguments.Name: --files
Arguments.Description: Specific filenames to run hooks on

Arguments.Name: --show-diff-on-failure
Arguments.Description: When hooks fail, run `git diff` directly afterward

Arguments.Name: --hook-stage
Arguments.Description: The stage during which the hook is fired

Arguments.Name: --remote-branch
Arguments.Description: Remote branch ref used by `git push`

Arguments.Name: --local-branch
Arguments.Description: Local branch ref used by `git push`

Arguments.Name: --from-ref
Arguments.Description: Represents the original ref in a `from_ref...to_ref` diff expression. For `pre-push` hooks, this represents the branch you are pushing to. For `post-checkout` hooks, this represents the branch that was previously checked out

Arguments.Name: --to-ref
Arguments.Description: Represents the destination ref in a `from_ref...to_ref` diff expression. For `pre-push` hooks, this represents the branch being pushed. For `post-checkout` hooks, this represents the branch that is now checked out

Arguments.Name: --commit-msg-filename
Arguments.Description: Filename to check when running during `commit-msg`

Arguments.Name: --checkout-type
Arguments.Description: Indicates whether the checkout was a branch checkout (changing branches, flag=1) or a file checkout (retrieving a file from the index, flag=0)

Arguments.Name: --is-squash-merge
Arguments.Description: During a post-merge hook, indicates whether the merge was a squash merge

Arguments.Name: --rewrite-command
Arguments.Description: During a post-rewrite hook, specifies the command that invoked the rewrite

Arguments.Name: --color
Arguments.Description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`

Arguments.Name: try-repo
Arguments.Description: Try the hooks in a repository, useful for developing new hooks

Arguments.Name: --color
Arguments.Description: Whether to use color in output. Defaults to `auto`

Arguments.Description: Run all files in the repo

Arguments.Name: --to-ref
Arguments.Description: Represents the destination ref in a `from_ref...to_ref` diff expression. For `pre-push` hooks, this represents the branch being pushed. For `post-checkout` hooks, this represents the branch that is now checked out
